snippet: Bill Stepien and Bridget Anne Kelly, who rose to occupy senior positions in Gov. Chris Christie’s administration, will be inextricably linked to Mr. Christie’s political fortunes.
abstract: Bill Stepien and Bridget Anne Kelly, who both rose to occupy senior positions in New Jersey Gov Chris Christie’s administration, are now inextricably linked to his political fortunes; Stepien and Kelly are latest handpicked loyalists to lose their jobs in wake of politically motivated closing of lanes to George Washington Bridge.

byline.contributor: Russ Buettner contributed reporting. Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Bill Stepien and Bridget Anne Kelly, who rose to occupy senior positions in Gov. Chris Christie’s administration, will be inextricably linked to Mr. Christie’s political fortunes.

headline.main: 2 Paths to New Jersey Governor’s Office Differed, but Fate Is the Same
headline.print_headline: 2 Paths to Governor’s Office Differed, but Fate Is Same
